specifications.name: Screen ResolutionInfo
specifications.hint: Screens come in a range of resolutions (measured in pixels, horizontal x vertical). The higher the resolution, the greater the picture quality.

specifications.name: Graphics
specifications.hint: Often referred to as a "graphics processing unit" (GPU), this device is responsible for displaying image content and decoding/encoding video content in programs and games.
